item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Well, Fi & I are off to Heathrow today and fly out to New York tomorrow - hopefully all will go to plan. Our plan is to gatecrash the Grammy awards on Sunday evening and indulge in some anti-war debates with our colonial friends in the USA!! Hope all is well - see you mid-March for a weekend in Witnesham.</p>
item.content:encoded: Well, Fi & I are off to Heathrow today and fly out to New York tomorrow – hopefully all will go to plan. Our plan is to gatecrash the Grammy awards on Sunday evening and indulge in some anti-war debates with our colonial friends in the USA!! Hope all is well – see you mid-March for a weekend in Witnesham.

item.title: By: damien
item.dc:creator: damien
item.description: <p>look out for those little fellas, they have a tendency to scratch. btw you should be taking pictures of your ipod around the world for ipodlounge...</p>
item.content:encoded: look out for those little fellas, they have a tendency to scratch. btw you should be taking pictures of your ipod around the world for ipodlounge…

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>AAHH!! Sorry about the duplicate messages - the computer here kept telling me it did not submit - obviously i brow beat it into submission in the end. Off to Pretoria today so must go and have breakfast</p>
